live_updates: Our teams have resolved the issue. Thank you for your patience!

Our technicians have been able to restore service to roughly half the affected customers and are continuing to work to get the rest online as soon as possible. We appreciate your continued patience. Thank you
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
56963.summary: Some customers in the Clearbrook area of Abbotsford are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
56963.title: Jan 15 - Abbotsford (Clearbrook) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
